comment: Weak version of ~ ax-12 from which we can prove any ~ ax-12 instance not involving wff variables or bundling. Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes. An instance of the first hypothesis will normally require that ` x ` and ` y ` be distinct (unless ` x ` does not occur in ` ph ` ). For an example of how the hypotheses can be eliminated when we substitute an expression without wff variables for ` ph ` , see ~ ax12wdemo . (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2017.)
